title: React E-Commerce Web App
description: A fully functional e-commerce web application built using React.js and React Router.

title: Todo List With Context API And Local Storage
description: A todo list app developed in React.js using Context API for state management and Local Storage for persistent data, even after the page is refreshed.

title: Docs Mini App in React
description: A mini documentation app built in React.js with smooth animations and transitions powered by Framer Motion for an enhanced user experience.

title: Nasheed Player In Vanilla JavaScript
description: A simple nasheed player built with Vanilla JavaScript that allows users to play nasheeds, featuring basic controls like play, pause, and next.
